properties.question: Where is the birthplace of Sant Dhanna?

properties.question: In which century did Sant Dhanna live?
properties.brief: Nirguna Bhakti; spiritual equality; first to bring Bhakti to masses.

properties.question: Where is the cave of Sant Pipaji?
properties.brief: Khichi king; tailor community patron; Nirguna tradition; Ramananda disciple.

properties.question: In which century did Sant Pipaji renounce his throne?
properties.brief: Social equality; Jhalawar region; renounced kingdom for Bhakti.

properties.question: Where is the Mukti Dham of Sant Jambhoji?
properties.brief: Bishnoi founder; 29 principles; environmentalism; wildlife protection.

properties.brief: Samrathal Dhora; Bikaner region; Vishnu incarnation belief.

properties.question: Where is the main seat of Sant Jasnath Ji?

properties.question: In which year did Sant Jasnath Ji attain Samadhi?
properties.brief: Youngest saint; Sikandar Lodi contemporary; Siddha community.

properties.question: Where is the main seat of the Dadu Panth?

properties.question: In which year did Dadu Dayal pass away in Naraina?
properties.brief: Bhakti reform; Akbar contemporary; Hindi-Gujarati-Braj blend poetry.

properties.question: In which century did Mira Bai compose her Bhakti pads?
properties.brief: Madhurya Bhava; Girdhar Gopal devotee; Chittorgarh connections.

properties.brief: Mewat saint; Hindu-Muslim unity; Alwar region; Laldasi sect.

properties.question: In which century did Sant Laldas influence the Mewat region?

properties.question: Where is the seat of the Ramanandi sect in Rajasthan?
properties.brief: Monkey temple; Krishna Das Payahari founder; Jaipur region.

properties.question: In which century was the Galta Ji seat established?
properties.brief: Prithvi Raj Kachwaha reign; displaced Nath panthis; Ramananda tradition.

properties.question: Where did Sant Charan Das establish his sect seat?
properties.brief: Alwar; 42 rules; Nadir Shah invasion predictor; women disciples (Sahjobai).
